start.talkText_eng: Where am I...where am I...? Am I alive?

start.talkText_kor: 적군인가! 손들어...! 윽! 무기도 없는데 날개까지...!
start.talkText_eng: Enemy! Hands up...! Ugh! No weapons, and wings...!

start.talkText_kor: 헉! 당신도? 저는 왼쪽 날개가 다쳤습니다! 그쪽은 오른쪽 날개가 다치셨네요!
start.talkText_eng: I have a wounded left wing, and you have a wounded right wing!
I'm not related to a white pigeon! I want to be punished!

start.talkText_kor: 글쎄요 지금 둘다 죽게 생겼는데 아군 적군이 어딨습니까.
start.talkText_eng: Well, we're both going to die now, so where are the friendly enemies?

start.talkText_kor: 태평한 녀석이로군... (하지만 틀린말은 아니야...) 좋다 이곳을 탈출할때까지 만이라도 협력해주지!
start.talkText_eng: You're an easy-going fellow... (but you're not wrong...) Good, I'll cooperate until we get out of here!

start.talkText_kor: (거만한 아저씨네...그래도 이렇게 말하면 화내겠지?) 하.하. 쿨하시네요! 좋습니다! 가볼까요!
start.talkText_eng: (You're being arrogant...but you're going to get mad at me for saying that, right?) Ha. Cool, that's great, let's go!

sprint.talkText_kor: 이런! 저기는 내 다리로 지나가려다가는 새모이가 되버리겠는걸?
sprint.talkText_eng: Oh no, that's going to be a birdie trying to run over my leg.

sprint.talkText_kor: 흥! 이정도도 못지나가다니 아주 쓸모없는 녀석이군. 비켜봐! 내 속도를 보여주지!
sprint.talkText_eng: Phew! You're so useless you can't even keep up with me. Move over! I'll show you my speed!

push.talkText_kor: 내 날개만 멀쩡했어도 저 박스를 던져버릴수 있었을텐데! 아쉽군. 자 이번엔 네 차례다 애송이!
push.talkText_eng: If only my wings were still intact, I could have thrown that box! Too bad. Now it's your turn, kid!

push.talkText_kor: (힘쓸때만 부하를 찾다니 저 나라도 똑같네..) 넵 비켜보십쇼!

fly.talkText_eng: I guess we have to fly to get there, right?

fly.talkText_kor: 날개가 이 모양인데 어떻게 난다는 거냐 멍청아!
fly.talkText_eng: How do you fly when your wings look like this, you idiot?

fly.talkText_kor: 이건 어떻습니까? 저는 오른쪽 날개로 상사님은 왼쪽날개로 날아보는겁니다. 둘이 힘을 합치면 날수 있지 않을까요?
fly.talkText_eng: How about this: I'll take the right wing and you take the left. Together we can fly, right?

fly.talkText_kor: 푸하하! 정신나간! 그게 말이 된다고 생각하나!
fly.talkText_eng: You're crazy! You think that makes sense?

fly.talkText_kor: 뭐 그럼 다른 방법 있습니까? 둘이 사이좋게 새모이가 되는것 말구요.
fly.talkText_eng: Well, is there any other way? We can both die here.

flyEnd.talkText_eng: I can't believe this is happening...

flyEnd.talkText_kor: 거봐요 제 말이 맞죠? 이제 좀 서로를 믿어보자구요!
flyEnd.talkText_eng: See, I'm right, right? Let's trust each other!

end.talkText_kor: ....고맙네 자네가 아니었으면 꼼짝없이 새모이가 될뻔 했어.
end.talkText_eng: ....Thank you, I would have died if it wasn't for you.

end.talkText_kor: 저도 상사님 아니었으면 큰일날뻔 했습니다. 정말 감사합니다.
end.talkText_eng: I would have been in trouble if it wasn't for you, so thank you so much.

end.talkText_kor: ....자네와 탈출하면서 많은 생각이 들었네. 우리는 다를게 없어! 서로 힘을 합치니까 믿을 수 없는 일도 해내지 않았나!
end.talkText_eng: ....I've been thinking a lot about escaping with you. We're no different, and together we've done unbelievable things!
We need to stop the war!
